description:
In 2010, and later years, I bought several video tutorials from Mr. Adam Block.

In the DVD material was also included below mentioned M42 raw frames that I have used several times on my PC to improve my processing skills.

Permission by Mr. Adam Block granted in Nov-2018 to show this M42 nebula picture on my astrobin account.
M42 raw frames credit belong to "Adam Block/Mount Lemmon SkyCenter/University of Arizona".

Raw frames/exposure details from 2008: Lum: 11x300sec+24x20sec. RGB: 3x(5x300sec+7x30sec)
Eq. that was used in 2008, at that time: A 0.6 m (24 in) Ritchey-Chrétien reflector that was build by RC Optical & camera SBIG ST-L-11K, temp -30 C.

Picture processing done by me where I used CCDStack2, Adobe Photoshop CS6 & RegiStar programs.
Blended into the shown M42 nebula picture are M42 center stars info. taken from here,
https://astrob.in/375238/C/

and a tiny amount of info. taken from this picture,
https://astrob.in/377593/0/

CS Niels
FYI, http://AdamBlockStudios.com
title: M42 nebula, a LRGB picture mainly taken in 2008
